name: typedoc-plugins-of-mine
description: typedoc plugins I'm making for my needs and learning

scripts.clean: yarn run-all clean; rm -rf node_modules build
scripts.test-clone: rm -rf ../typedoc-plugins-of-mine-test; mkdir ../typedoc-plugins-of-mine-test; cd ../typedoc-plugins-of-mine-test; git clone ../typedoc-plugins-of-mine/.git;  cd typedoc-plugins-of-mine ; yarn; yarn run-all install; yarn test
